page.title: 20Credits
page.content:
We are extremely grateful for the help and contributions received from the following people: The staff and children of St. Matthew's C.of E. School, Normanton. Residents who co-operated with us in our survey, and allowed us access to their property. The children in our school who made either a personal or group effort to contribute, and also the staff, for their constant support and encouragement.
Class 8, with Miss Hunter, Class 7, with Mr. Robbins,
also Mrs. Lord and Mr. Duffy.
Edna G. Olds Primary School.
